mapper.select:
/* 렌탈CB 연체정보 조회 (고객번호별) */ SELECT X.CST_NO /*고객번호*/ , T2.CST_KNM /*고객명*/ , T2.COPN_DV_CD /*법인격구분코드*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'COPN_DV_CD', T2.COPN_DV_CD) AS COPN_DV_NM /*법인격구분명*/ , T2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대폰번호1*/ , T2.MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대폰번호2*/ , T2.CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대폰번호3*/ , X.DLQ_AMT /*연체금액*/ , X.DLQ_BLAM /*연체잔액*/ , X.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO /*집금담당자번호*/ , (SELECT PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_CBBO_CLCTAM_PRTNR_DTL /*T:집금파트너상세*/ WHERE PRTNR_NO = X.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO AND ROWNUM <= 1) AS PRTNR_KNM /*집금담당자명*/ , '1588-4113' AS DSPH_TNO /*발신번호*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(T5.FWBOO_DTM,1,8),'YYYYMMDD')+4,'YYYYMMDD') AS RGST_SCH_DT /*등록예정일자-알림톡발송일자+4일*/ , NVL((SELECT NOTY_RCV_YN FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ /*T:WELLS렌탈CB연체내역*/ WHERE CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND SUBSTR(OC_BSDT,1,6) = X.OC_BSYM AND ROWNUM <= 1),'N') AS NOTY_RCV_YN /*알림수신여부*/ FROM (SELECT SUBSTR(A.OC_BSDT,1,6) AS OC_BSYM , A.CST_NO , A.NOTY_TRS_DT , A.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO , SUM(NVL(A.DLQ_AMT,0)) AS DLQ_AMT , SUM(NVL(A.DLQ_BLAM,0)) AS DLQ_BLAM FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ A /*T:WELLS렌탈CB연체내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS B /*T:고객기본*/ ON B.CST_NO = A.CST_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.RENTAL_CB_RGST_DV_CD IN ('1','3') /*렌탈CB등록구분코드-1:발생,3:변동*/ AND NVL(A.DLQ_BLAM,0) > 0 /*연체잔액*/ AND A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SUBSTR(A.OC_BSDT,1,6) LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM')||'%' /*발생기준일자*/
AND A.CST_NO = #{cstNo} /*고객번호*/
AND B.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO = #{cralLocaraTno} /*휴대폰번호1*/
AND B.MEXNO_ENCR = #{mexnoEncr} /*휴대폰번호2-입력된값을 암호화하여 대입*/
AND B.CRAL_IDV_TNO = #{cralIdvTno} /*휴대폰번호3*/
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_IZ /*T:채권접촉제외대상내역*/ WHERE CST_NO = A.CST_NO AND CTNT_EXCD_BND_BIZ_CD = '02' /*연락제외채권업무코드-02:렌탈CB*/ AND CTNT_EXCD_OJ_TP_CD = '01' /*연락제외대상유형코드-01:고객번호*/ AND CTNT_EXCD_MEDI_TP_CD IN ('02','03') /*연락제외매체유형코드-02:문자,03:알림톡*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN APY_STRTDT AND APY_ENDDT) /*적용시작일자~종료일자*/ GROUP BY SUBSTR(A.OC_BSDT,1,6) , A.CST_NO , A.NOTY_TRS_DT , A.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO ) X INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T2 /*T:고객기본*/ ON T2.CST_NO = X.CST_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM TB_CBBO_BND_MSG_RELY_IZ WHERE FW_BIZ_NM = 'BN_KAKAO_MESSAGE' /*발송업무명*/ AND MSG_FW_TP_CD = '01' /*메시지발송유형코드-01:카카오알림톡*/ AND BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 = 'B' /*채권알림톡업무코드-B:예고관련*/ AND BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 = 'B05' /*채권알림톡업무상세코드-B05:렌탈CB연체정보등록 예고*/ ) T5 /*T:채권메시지중계내역*/ ON T5.CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND SUBSTR(T5.FST_RGST_DTM,1,8) = X.NOTY_TRS_DT /*알림전송일자*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ATA_MMT_TRAN WHERE TEMPLATE_CODE = 'wells18153' /*템플릿코드*/ ) T6 /*T:알림톡전송*/ ON T6.RESERVED3 = T5.BND_MSG_RELY_ID /*채권메시지중계ID*/ AND T6.RESERVED1 = T5.BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 /*채권알림톡업무코드*/ AND T6.RESERVED2 = T5.BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 /*채권알림톡업무상세코드*/ AND T6.RESERVED5 = T5.FW_BIZ_NM /*발송업무명*/ WHERE 1 = 1

/* 렌탈CB 연체정보 조회 (계약별) */ SELECT X.CST_NO /*고객번호*/ , T2.CST_KNM /*고객명*/ , T3.CNTR_NO||'-'||T3.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_DTL_NO /*계약상세번호*/ , T2.COPN_DV_CD /*법인격구분코드*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'COPN_DV_CD', T2.COPN_DV_CD, #{session.langId}) AS COPN_DV_NM /*법인격구분명*/ , (SELECT CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D WHERE TENANT_ID = #{session.tenantId} AND CD_ID = 'SELL_TP_CD' AND CD_VLD_VAL = T5.SELL_TP_CD) AS SELL_TP_NM /*상품구분*/ , T7.PD_CLSF_NM /*상품명*/ , (SELECT SL_RCOG_DT FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ /*T:WELLS매출월마감내역*/ WHERE CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T3.CNTR_SN AND SL_CL_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM')) AS SL_RCOG_DT /*매출일자*/ , T2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대폰번호1*/ , T2.MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대폰번호2*/ , T2.CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대폰번호3*/ , (SELECT MPY_BSDT FROM (SELECT TT1.MPY_BSDT , ROWNUM FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS TT1 WHERE TT1.CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND TT1.CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO ORDER BY TT1.FNL_MDFC_DTM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1) AS MPY_BSDT /*자동이체 약정일자*/ , (SELECT (SELECT CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D WHERE TENANT_ID = #{session.tenantId} AND CD_ID = 'FNT_DV_CD' AND CD_VLD_VAL = S1.FNT_DV_CD) FROM TB_RVCL_BIL_PLAN_BAS S1 /*T:청구계획기본*/ WHERE CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T3.CNTR_SN AND BIL_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') AND ROWNUM <= 1) AS FNT_DV_NM /*결제수단*/ , X.DLQ_AMT /*연체금액*/ , X.DLQ_BLAM /*연체잔액*/ , T3.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO /*집금담당자번호*/ , (SELECT PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_CBBO_CLCTAM_PRTNR_DTL /*T:집금파트너상세*/ WHERE PRTNR_NO = T3.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO AND ROWNUM <= 1) AS PRTNR_KNM /*집금담당자명*/ , '1588-4113' AS DSPH_TNO /*발신번호*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(T8.FWBOO_DTM,1,8),'YYYYMMDD')+4,'YYYYMMDD') AS RGST_SCH_DT /*등록예정일자-알림톡발송일자+4일*/ FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ X /*T:WELLS렌탈CB연체내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T2 /*T:고객기본*/ ON T2.CST_NO = X.CST_NO INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS WHERE BND_BIZ_DV_CD IN ('L20','L21') /*채권업무구분코드- L20:렌탈 L21:리스 */ AND BASE_YM = #{baseYm} AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' )T3 /*T:채권계약기본*/ ON T3.CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND T3.CNTR_NO = X.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T5 /*T:계약상세*/ ON T5.CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND T5.CNTR_SN = T3.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T6 /*T:상품기본*/ ON T6.PD_CD = T5.BASE_PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS T7 /*T:상품분류기본*/ ON T7.PD_CLSF_ID = T6.PD_CLSF_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM TB_CBBO_BND_MSG_RELY_IZ WHERE FW_BIZ_NM = 'BN_KAKAO_MESSAGE' /*발송업무명*/ AND MSG_FW_TP_CD = '01' /*메시지발송유형코드-01:카카오알림톡*/ AND BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 = 'B' /*채권알림톡업무코드-B:예고관련*/ AND BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 = 'B05' /*채권알림톡업무상세코드-B05:렌탈CB연체정보등록 예고*/ ) T8 /*T:채권메시지중계내역*/ ON T8.CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND SUBSTR(T5.FST_RGST_DTM,1,8) = X.NOTY_TRS_DT /*알림전송일자*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ATA_MMT_TRAN WHERE TEMPLATE_CODE = 'wells18153' /*템플릿코드*/ ) T9 /*T:알림톡전송*/ ON T9.RESERVED2 = T8.BND_MSG_RELY_ID /*채권메시지중계ID*/ AND T9.RESERVED3 = T8.FW_BIZ_NM /*발송업무명*/ AND T9.RESERVED4 = T8.BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 /*채권알림톡업무코드*/ AND T9.RESERVED5 = T8.BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 /*채권알림톡업무상세코드*/ WHERE 1 = 1 AND X.RENTAL_CB_RGST_DV_CD IN ('1','3') /*렌탈CB등록구분코드-1:발생,3:변동*/ AND NVL(X.DLQ_BLAM,0) > 0 /*연체잔액*/ AND X.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SUBSTR(X.OC_BSDT,1,6) LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM')||'%' /*발생기준일자*/
AND X.CST_NO = #{cstNo} /*고객번호*/
AND B.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO = #{cralLocaraTno} /*휴대폰번호1*/
AND B.MEXNO_ENCR = #{mexnoEncr} /*휴대폰번호2-입력된값을 암호화하여 대입*/
AND B.CRAL_IDV_TNO = #{cralIdvTno} /*휴대폰번호3*/
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_IZ /*T:채권접촉제외대상내역*/ WHERE CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND CTNT_EXCD_BND_BIZ_CD = '02' /*연락제외채권업무코드-02:렌탈CB*/ AND CTNT_EXCD_OJ_TP_CD = '01' /*연락제외대상유형코드-01:고객번호*/ AND CTNT_EXCD_MEDI_TP_CD IN ('02','03') /*연락제외매체유형코드-02:문자,03:알림톡*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN APY_STRTDT AND APY_ENDDT) /*적용시작일자~종료일자*/
mapper.update:
/* 렌탈CB 연체정보 조회 - 저장(알림톡 대상 선정) */ UPDATE TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ SET NOTY_FW_OJ_YN = 'Y'
WHERE 1 = 1 AND CST_NO = #{cstNo} AND OC_BSDT LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM')||'%' AND NVL(NOTY_RCV_YN,'N') = 'N'
mapper.select: /* 렌탈CB납입정보(팝업) */ SELECT B1.CST_NO /* 고객번호 */ , B1.CST_KNM /* 고객명 */ , B1.CNTR_NO || '-' || B1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_DTL_NO /* 계약상세번호 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'COPN_DV_CD', B1.COPN_DV_CD, #{session.langId}) AS COPN_DV_NM /* 법인격구분명 */ , B1.COPN_DV_CD /* 법인격구분코드 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'SELL_TP_CD', B1.SELL_TP_CD, #{session.langId}) AS SELL_TP_NM /* 상품구분 */ , (SELECT X2.PD_CLSF_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS X1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS X2 /* 상품분류기본 */ ON X2.PD_CLSF_ID = X1.PD_CLSF_ID WHERE X1.PD_CD = B1.BASE_PD_CD) AS PD_CLSF_NM /* 상품명 */ , (SELECT X3.SL_RCOG_DT FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ X3 /* WELLS매출월마감내역 */ WHERE X3.CNTR_NO = B1.CNTR_NO AND X3.CNTR_SN = B1.CNTR_SN AND X3.SL_CL_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(B1.OC_BSDT,'YYYYMMDD'),-1),'YYYYMM')) AS SL_RCOG_DT /* 매출일자 */ , B1.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /* 휴대폰번호1 */ , B1.MEXNO_ENCR /* 휴대폰번호2 */ , B1.CRAL_IDV_TNO /* 휴대폰번호3 */ , B1.MPY_BSDT /* 자동이체약정일자 */ , (SELECT F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'DP_TP_CD', X4.DP_TP_CD, #{session.langId}) FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS X4 /* 청구계획기본 */ WHERE X4.CNTR_NO = B1.CNTR_NO AND X4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY FNL_MDFC_DTM DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY) AS FNT_DV_NM /* 결제수단 */ , B1.DLQ_AMT /* 연체금액 */ , B1.DLQ_BLAM - NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(RVE_AMT,0)) FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL X6 /* 수납상세 */ WHERE X6.CNTR_NO = B1.CNTR_NO AND X6.RVE_PROCS_YN = 'Y' /* 수납처리여부 */ AND X6.DP_DV_CD = '1' /* 입금구분코드-1:입금 */ AND X6.DP_MES_CD IN ('01','02') /* 입금수단코드-01:현금,02:신용카드 */ AND X6.RVE_DT BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(B1.OC_BSDT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1), 'YYYYMM') ||'01' AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(B1.OC_BSDT,'YYYYMMDD'), 1), 'YYYYMM') || LPAD(NVL(B1.MPY_BSDT, '31'), 2, '0')), 0) AS DLQ_BLAM /* 연체잔액 */ , B1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO /* 집금담당자번호 */ , (SELECT X5.PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_CBBO_CLCTAM_PRTNR_DTL X5 /* 집금파트너상세 */ WHERE X5.PRTNR_NO = B1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO AND X5.OG_TP_CD = 'HR1') AS PRTNR_KNM /* 집금담당자명 */ , '1588-4113' AS DSPH_TNO /* 발신번호 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B1.FWBOO_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') + 4,'YYYYMMDD') AS RGST_SCH_DT /* 등록예정일자-알림톡발송일자+4일 */ , B1.NICE_FW_EXCD_YN /* NICE발송제외여부 */ , B1.FWBOO_DT /* 알림톡발송일자 */ , (SELECT CASE WHEN X9.RESULT = '1000' THEN 'Y' WHEN X9.RESULT != '1000' THEN 'N' END FROM TB_CBBO_BND_MSG_RELY_IZ X7 /* 채권메시지중계내역 */ INNER JOIN ATA_MMT_TRAN X8 /* 전송테이블 */ ON X8.RESERVED2 = X7.BND_MSG_RELY_ID /*채권메시지중계ID*/ AND X8.RESERVED3 = X7.FW_BIZ_NM /*발송업무명*/ AND X8.RESERVED4 = X7.BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 /*채권알림톡업무코드*/ AND X8.RESERVED5 = X7.BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 /*채권알림톡업무상세코드*/ AND X8.TEMPLATE_CODE = 'wells18153' /* 템플릿코드 */ INNER JOIN ATA_MMT_LOG X9 /* 로그테이블 */ ON X9.MT_PR = X8.MT_PR WHERE X7.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND X7.FW_BIZ_NM = 'BN_KAKAO_MESSAGE' /* 발송업무명 */ AND X7.MSG_FW_TP_CD = '01' /* 메시지발송유형코드-01:카카오알림톡 */ AND X7.BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 = 'B' /* 채권알림톡업무코드-B:등록관련 */ AND X7.BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 = 'B05' /* 채권알림톡업무상세코드-B05:렌탈CB연체정보등록 예고 */ AND X7.CST_NO = B1.CST_NO ORDER BY X9.MT_SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AS RESULT_YN /* 알림톡성공여부 */ , '' AS NOTY_FW_OJ_DT /* 알림톡발송제외일자 */ FROM (SELECT A1.CST_NO , A1.CNTR_NO , A1.OC_BSDT , A1.DLQ_AMT , A1.DLQ_BLAM , A1.NICE_FW_EXCD_YN , A2.CST_KNM , A2.COPN_DV_CD , A2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , A2.MEXNO_ENCR , A2.CRAL_IDV_TNO , A4.CNTR_SN , A1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO , A4.BASE_PD_CD , A4.SELL_TP_CD , (SELECT Z2.MPY_BSDT FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL Z1 /* 계약결제관계 */ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS Z2 ON Z2.CNTR_STLM_ID = Z1.CNTR_STLM_ID AND Z2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE Z1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND Z1.DTL_CNTR_NO = A1.CNTR_NO AND Z1.CNTR_STLM_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY Z1.VL_END_DTM DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AS MPY_BSDT , (SELECT MAX(SUBSTR(Z3.FWBOO_DTM, 1, 8)) FROM TB_CBBO_BND_MSG_RELY_IZ Z3 /* 채권메시지중계내역 */ WHERE Z3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND Z3.FW_BIZ_NM = 'BN_KAKAO_MESSAGE' /*발송업무명*/ AND Z3.MSG_FW_TP_CD = '01' /*메시지발송유형코드-01:카카오알림톡*/ AND Z3.BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 = 'B' /*채권알림톡업무코드-B:등록관련*/ AND Z3.BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 = 'B05' /*채권알림톡업무상세코드-B05:렌탈CB연체정보등록 예고*/ AND Z3.CST_NO = A1.CST_NO) AS FWBOO_DT FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ A1 /* WELLS렌탈CB연체내역 */ -- CNTR_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS A2 /* 고객기본 */ ON A2.CST_NO = A1.CST_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL A4 /* 계약상세 */ ON A4.CNTR_NO = A1.CNTR_NO AND A4.CNTR_SN = 1 WHERE A1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A1.RENTAL_CB_RGST_DV_CD IN ('1','3') /* 렌탈CB등록구분코드-1:발생,3:변동 */ AND NVL(A1.DLQ_BLAM, 0) > 0 /* 연체잔액 */ AND A1.CST_NO = #{cstNo} ) B1 WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_IZ X0 /* 채권접촉제외대상내역 */ WHERE X0.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND X0.CTNT_EXCD_BND_BIZ_CD = '02' /* 연락제외채권업무코드-02:렌탈CB */ AND X0.CTNT_EXCD_OJ_TP_CD = '01' /* 연락제외대상유형코드-01:고객번호 */ AND X0.CTNT_EXCD_MEDI_TP_CD IN ('02','03') /* 연락제외매체유형코드-02:문자,03:알림톡 */ AND B1.FWBOO_DT BETWEEN X0.APY_STRTDT AND X0.APY_ENDDT) /* 적용시작일자~종료일자 */
